Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th -bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th -bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near 47th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
